= Other side of the gate =
== Creatures ==
* [[Young Blazeworm, level 4 Elite Brute>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=1442||rel="__blank"]] * [[Flamespiker, level 5 Soldier>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=2928||rel="__blank"]] * [[Elemental Evil Mudborn, level 6 Controller>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=6019||rel="__blank"]] * [[Young Blizzard Dragon, level 7 Elite Controller>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=4841||rel="__blank"]] * [[Xorn, level 9 Skirmisher>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=3116||rel="__blank"]] * [[Young Earthquake Dragon, level 9 Elite Soldier>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=4846||rel="__blank"]] * [[Silt Elemental, level 11 Skirmisher>>url:http://www.wizards.com/dndinsider/compendium/monster.aspx?id=5585||rel="__blank"]]
== Terrain ==
